name: IoU
hover_text: Compute Intersection over Union for selected geometries.

name: get_WKT
hover_text: Show WKT (Well-Known Text) of selected geometry.

name: import_WKT
hover_text: Select one editable feature and paste WKT to replace its geometry (edit buffer only)

name: Google Maps Link
hover_text: Open Google Maps centered on the current QGIS view.

name: Field Values (CSV)
hover_text: List selected features' field values as comma-separated string.

name: Stats
hover_text: Display average area of selected geometries.

name: To Octagon
hover_text: Convert selected geometries to equivalent-area octagons.

name: Box Positions
hover_text: Extract positions from rectangular bounding boxes.

name: SQL BBox
hover_text: Generate SQL WHERE clause from selected extent.

name: Buffer
hover_text: Buffer selected geometries with precision in meters

name: Densification
hover_text: Densifies geometries by adding the minimum number of evenly spaced vertices to edges longer than a specified maximum length, with distances and interpolation performed in EPSG:3857

name: Anti-meridian Snap
hover_text: Snaps horizontally the vertices of outer rings of the selected geometries, that are close to anti-meridian line within provided tolerance in degrees
